CLEARANCE_ALREADY_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Chaidh an cead a thoirt dhut mar-thà. Lean air adhart gun bhàgh docaidh {bay}.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_NO_BAYS.message: Chaidh an cead a dhiùltadh. Chan eil bàgh docaidh saor ann.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.description: Shown if player requests docking too far away from station
CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.message: Chaidh an cead a dhiùltadh. Tha ur soitheach cho fad air falbh ach an gabhadh aithneachadh.

CLEARANCE_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Chaidh an cead a thoirt dhuibh. Leanaibh air adhart gu bàgh docaidh {bay}.

DOCKING_CLEARANCE_EXPIRED.message: Dh’fhalbh an ùine air a’ chead laighe agaibh. Ma tha sibh airson docadh, feumaidh sibh iarrtas ùr a chur a-steach.

STATION_GRAV.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

STATION_GRAV_PRESS.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions
STATION_GRAV_PRESS.message: Is {grav} an iom-tharraing agus {press} am brùthadh-àile ionadail.

WATCH_FOR_TRAFFIC_ON_APPROACH.message: Thoiribh sùil a-mach air an trafaig nuair a dhlùthas sibh.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel} , tha sibh a’ tighinn a-steach gu sgìre {station}. Gèillibh ris na riaghailtean ionadail.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_2.message: {playerShipLabel}, chì sinn air an rèidear sibh. Tha sibh ann an sgìre fo smachd {station}.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, seo stiùireadh trafaige {station}. Tha sibh a’ tighinn gu sgìre fo ar smachd.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_4.message: Tha sibh ag itealadh gu sgìre fo smachd {station}, {playerShipLabel}.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}, fàilte gu {station}. Thoiribh an aire gum bi riaghailtean an sàs fhad ’s a bhios sibh ag itealadh tron sgìre againn.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, seo stiùireadh trafaige {station} a’ bruidhinn ribh. Tha sibh a’ tighinn a-steach gu sgìre fo ar smachd agus b’ fheàrr leam nach dèiliginn ri pàipearachd an-diugh.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel}, tha sibh air an sgìre fo smachd {station} fhàgail.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_2.message: Dh’fhàg sibh an sgìre fo smachd {station}, {playerShipLabel}.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, tha sibh air an sgìre fo smachd {station} fhàgail. Chan eil ar riaghailtean oirbh tuilleadh.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_4.message: Tha sibh a’ fàgail sgìre {station}, {playerShipLabel}. ’Gur clàradh a-mach.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}, tha sibh a’ fàgail sgìre {station}. Gabhaibh air ur socair.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, seo stiùireadh trafaige {station}. Tha mi a’ faicinn gu bheil sibh a’ fàgail an sgìre againn. Turas slàn sàbhailte dhuibh!
